itemInfo.itemDesc: An earring decorated with a Dark Blood Ruby.

item.name: Blood Ruby Earrings
item.desc: An earring decorated with a Blood Ruby.

item.name: Iron Ingot
item.desc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards. It requires knowledge of Heating: Beginner.
※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Resplendent Ruby
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding a Rough Ruby. It requires the knowledge of Grinding: Beginner.

※ Find Ornella in Heidel and complete the Materials for Equipment Repair Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Corrupt Ruby Earrings
item.desc: An earring decorated with a Corrupt Ruby.
